Municipal Elections
===================



Sub Menu

### Related Pages

* [HB2626 Campaign Finance Reports](https://www.weslacotx.gov/government/city_secretary/hb2626_post.php)

### Contact Us

Office of the Mayor  
255 S. Kansas Ave.  
Weslaco, Texas 78596  
[956.968.3181](tel:9569683181)

* [Home](https://www.weslacotx.gov/)
* [Government](https://www.weslacotx.gov/government/index.php)
* [City Secretary](https://www.weslacotx.gov/government/city_secretary/index.php)
* Elections

The Weslaco City Commission is comprised of one Mayor - elected at-large, Two At - Large Commissioners, Four Single Member Districts.    
All serve staggered, four-year terms.
